description.en: The younger of twin mages from Mysidia known for their outstanding talent. Prone to slacking and a bit too big for his britches、 he is often subject to a good scolding from his older sister、 Porom. He initially joins Cecil to keep an eye on the knight、 but becomes a willing ally during the course of their adventures.
description.jp:
魔法国家ミシディアの中でも 突出した
才能を持つ双子の弟。サボり癖や調子に
乗るところがありそれを姉のポロムに
たしなめられることが多い。
最初はセシルの監視役だったが
彼との冒険を経て絆が生まれ
自らの意思で協力するようになる。

jp.text: しかたなく手を貸してやるんだから ありがたく思えよ！
ざっと こんなもんさ！
これだから 大人はめんどくさいんだよ
あんたらを ここで 殺させやしない！
しっかりしろ あんちゃん！

gl.text: I'm only helping you because he told me to. You'd better be thankful!
And that、 my friends、 is how it's done!
Grownups... Always have to be so pigheaded!
We won't let you all die like this!
Come on! You can do it!

desc.en:
2-HIT AoE BRV+HP attack.
Inflicts Ice Resistance Down for 4 turns.
Follows up with a 5-HIT AoE BRV+HP attack.
Moderately increases BRV damage to a single target.
 HP damage is equally divided among all targets.
Extends the duration of Power of Black Magic and Wisdom of Black Magic by 3 turns.
Also extends the duration of BRV Attack+ and Dualcast by 3 turns.
desc.gl:
2-hit group magic BRV attack + group HP attack
5-hit group magic BRV attack + group HP attack
Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
Deals proportionate HP damage to each target
All enemies: 4 turns Ice Resist Down from first HP attack
Extends active Dark Wisdom, Dark Arts duration 3 turns
Extends BRV Attack+, Dualcast duration by 3 turns
desc.jp:
2HIT全体魔法BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃
＋5HIT全体魔法BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃
攻撃対象が単体の時 与えるBRVダメージ中アップ
与えるHPダメージは分配
最初のHP攻撃時に敵全体に4ACTION「氷耐性ダウン」付与
自身に付与されている
「黒魔の叡智」「黒魔の力」を3ACTION延長し
「BRV攻撃＋」「連続魔法」への変化期間も
3ACTION延長する

desc.gl: Ice Resist Down: Lowers Ice resist (does not stack)
desc.jp: 氷耐性ダウン：氷属性耐性が減少する（同属性の減少効果は重複しない）

desc.gl:
2-hit group magic BRV attack + group HP attack
5-hit group magic BRV attack + group HP attack
Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
Deals proportionate HP damage to each target
All enemies: 4 turns Ice Resist Down from first HP attack
Self: 6 turns Ice Enchant
Extends active Dark Wisdom, Dark Arts duration 3 turns
Extends BRV Attack+, Dualcast duration by 3 turns
desc.jp:
2HIT全体魔法BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃
